website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for a protein bar with quality ingredients that is a good substitution for candy, these bars are worth a try.
pros: Quest's Hero Bars will make you think you are eating candy bars, thanks to the chocolate coating with a caramel and pecan center
Despite the sweet goodness, they are packed with fiber and protein like others by the brand
cons: On the pricey side, as the pack only contains 10 bars
Sweetness level is too intense for some

customer_reviews.title: Kicks me out of ketosis
customer_reviews.text: Must have hidden sugars not listed in ingredients. They will kick you out of ketosis. I was wondering what was stalling my weight loss, so I did an experiment and tested my ketone levels before and after I ate one these bars. Sure enough, kicked me out for the rest of the day.
customer_reviews.author: J&A Garcia

customer_reviews.title: This is a tough review because I really like the product
customer_reviews.text: This is a tough review because I really like the product. It is one of my favorite meal replacement options. I love the taste and have had great results. I would warn not to buy from this distributor, however. I've tried twice now and both times the bars came melted and hard and inedible. Go get this product from your local store, but don't trust them to be as good when ordered online.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Chase

customer_reviews.title: 13G of SUGAR - NOT 1G of sugar
customer_reviews.text: These have 13 grams of sugar per bar. This is clearly false or misrepresentative advertising. On the main picture above they have on the box "1g", my box arrived and didn't have that anywhere. They taste ok. Not amazing, but not bad. I guess this can be a cheat day protein bar?
customer_reviews.author: kdizz

customer_reviews.title: 15-17 grams of Protein, NOT 20-21 grams as Advertised. Is this False Advertisement?
customer_reviews.text: Quest Hero Bar, Variety Pack 15, 16 and 17 grams of protein as listed on the packaging of the Quest Hero Bars. The Ad page stipulates 20-21 grams of protein. Same Ad page that provides information “About the product” • QUEST NUTRITION HERO BAR VARIETY PACK • CHEAT CLEAN. Eat toward your goals and love every bite along the way! With 20-21 grams of protein and plenty of fiber, these delicious protein bars are soy-free, gluten-free, have no added sugar, and don't include unnecessary carbs.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very sweet, but delicious. I like the fact that these don't mess with my blood glucose levels.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry

customer_reviews.title: Food that makes you sick entirely defeats the purpose
customer_reviews.text: Beware bad storage procedures and old product. I understand this will vary by supplier, but we have little choice over what the product looks like or if it's even fresh. I ignored the melted shipments in summer because it's hard to beat southern heat. The last two boxes tasted a little old and I ignored that because I'm after no-hassle, consistent nutrition rather than taste. This last box was delivered on Nov. 1st, 2019--the first bar out was nearly rancid and had an expiration date of Nov. 2, 2019 (tomorrow!). My stomach is a little queasy, which is most definitely NOT what I pay for. Yet another decent idea ruined by terrible business practices.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Packaging issues
customer_reviews.text: I love the bars. I think they all taste great and have a decent amount of protein and fiber to help keep you full. They would get 5 stars if this was just about the bars. My problem is with the packaging. These arrived in a Ziploc baggie and were partially crushed and melted. They still taste fine but are definitely more messy and not what I was expecting.
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Way too sweet
customer_reviews.text: These things are way too sweet and honestly not worth the carbs or calories (they are low carb, not zero carb). I feel like they had a funny after taste as well. If you are looking for a low carb sweet, there are tons of recipes that are a million times better tasting.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Oliveira

customer_reviews.title: Allulose is Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Don't get me wrong; these taste phenomenal. But... the allulose definitely affects my blood sugar - I'm ravenous an hour later. Also, and most importantly, the allulose - within 3-4 hours - gives me horrendous bloating and gas. If I eat more than two within a short window I get explosive diarrhea. My recommendation would be to replace the Allulose with more erythritol and sucralose. I use erythritol and sucralose together all the time in my baking and can't tell it's not sweetened with sugar; also no gas no blood sugar crashes. No allulose also means a less expensive bar.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Fox

customer_reviews.title: KETO Chocolate caramel rice crispies treat.
customer_reviews.text: My partner and I shared the box of 10 bars. Well, we got these 5 days ago and there is only 1 left so I'm currently ordering more. The texture is unlike any other protein bar we have tried. It's a thicker bar that you sink your teeth into. Delightfully crunchy & sweet. It skyrocketed to my #1 position for protein bars after the 1st bite. I hope the other flavors are as amazing, can't wait to try them! Also amazon packaged them really well with an ice pack & I super appreciate that because it's been HOT.
customer_reviews.author: GMW

customer_reviews.title: Tastes Like a Candy Bar!😋
customer_reviews.text: Something that tastes this good can’t be nutritious, can it? Well, according to the packaging it has 15 g of protein, 11 g of fiber and 4 net carbs. Great for a Keto diet or low carb diet! It has 200 calories. Instead of sugar, it contains allulose. “It tastes like sugar, but up to 100% of it passes through the body without being metabolized.......doesn’t affect your body like “regular” sugar.” Delicious!
customer_reviews.author: Susan1

customer_reviews.title: Best protein bar around
customer_reviews.text: Best tasting protein bars I have ever tried. I love the original quest bars but these are 100x better. They have a caramel center and some crunchy nut topping covered in chocolate. I liked to place mine in the fridge and it taste like a cold candy bar. It states it has low glycemic index, I did not measure my insulin after eating one however, I know some others have had glycemic spikes from these.
customer_reviews.author: alex.overberg

customer_reviews.title: Tasty and convenient
customer_reviews.text: I have had a lot of protein bars and the hero bars from quest are among the best tasting and have the best texture. The flavor of these is pretty mild, not too sweet and a little savory - particularly when you get a chunk of pecan. The hero line also uses allulose, which doesn't have any weird after taste like some other sweeteners. The texture is great. The chocolate coating is thick, the caramel isn't too sticky and the "bar" isn't gritty or crunchy, but still has a solid bite to it. I will note that the hero line is geared toward the keto diet, so there's a lot more fat than a typical protein bar.
customer_reviews.author: John M. Colville

customer_reviews.title: Quest is the best! Yummy yum yum!!!
customer_reviews.text: Not your average protein bar. The texture is more like the Special K protein bars but with better quality ingredients. I use them as a snack between meals and sometimes as a quick pre or post workout protein source. I’ve tried all the flavors and they all taste great but the chocolate caramel is the best. Quest Nutrition makes quality products and Amazon has the best prices and service. I’ll be honest I’ve found them a little cheaper at a couple other places but every time I’ve ordered they arrive damaged. In about 8 orders from Amazon they always arrive on time and in good condition. Give them a try. You won’t be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: FIFTEEN (15) NET CARBS PER BAR!!
customer_reviews.text: All of the packaging states that these bars are only 4 net carbs. If you're on a keto diet, you need to be made aware that the carb count is actually 15 NET CARBS per bar. That's nearly my total number of carbs for one day, so I know I went over my limit when I had one of these bars. 28 Total Carbs 11 grams Fiber 2 grams Sugar Alcohols EQUALS 15 NET CARBS---YIKES!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy if you live where it is hot. They will come melted.
customer_reviews.text: I love these bars. I usually have them for breakfast.Chocolate Carmel is my favorite, but sometimes have a hard time finding in grocery stores. Thought I would try ordering online. Ordered these a couple of weeks ago and the bars were perfect, but weather not as warm as it was today when my next box arrived. Bars were melting. Makes no sense why you would send chocolate products in hot weather without something to keep it from melting. Will not buy again unless it is winter time.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Never once kicked me out of ketosis!
customer_reviews.text: I have eaten Quest Bars steadily the entire time I have been on the keto diet and test myself regularly & it never once kicked me out of ketosis. It must effect people differently. I think you should limit yourself on the Chocolate Carmel Pecan ones though they are tempting and sweet & I don’t know if I trust its truly 4 net carbs. I also think it may mimic sugar and cause insulin release possibly.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin Rustemeyer

customer_reviews.title: The best protein bar I've ever had!!
customer_reviews.text: When I first tasted one of these bars I could not believe that it was a protein bar because of how good it was! I always bought the original Quest bars and they were just ok but not these tasty bars. This is definitely my new go to when I'm in a hurry. If you are not sure of buying these because of the chalky flavor most protein bars have I can assure you this bar is different!
customer_reviews.author: Moreno

customer_reviews.title: Could be be
customer_reviews.text: Usually my favorite delivery, we love these and go through a box a week! They are our go to for breakfast and by far the best Quest bars. I would give it 5 stars but the box was damaged last week (which wasn’t the worst because I don’t eat the box) and this week the ice pack had a hole in it. The entire silver package as well as all the quest bars are completely cover in the liquid from the ice pack. Which makes me a little uncomfortable. The shipping box it’s self had zero damage both times. I may still continue to order and might up date my raiting on how my deliveries go.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Don't order this if you are somewhere warm.
customer_reviews.text: So the product it's self is good. If you've ordered Quest products in the past, you know what to expect. These particular bars are crunchy in the middle with a covering of either chocolate or I believe yogurt. The problem is if you get these shipped, the sun will melt the cover leaving you with a big mess to try to eat.
customer_reviews.author: WoooPigSooie

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to absolutly love them, but they're just fine. Really, they're fine.
customer_reviews.text: I expected them to taste so much better... i guess i was expecting more of a candy bar wave than a protein bar wave, but after a few of them i started to be okay with it. its probably for the better though, since they won't make you crave them too much. They deliver and they're fine, just don't expect a delicious treat and you won't be dissapointed. they did upset my stomach a little bit, but that's really personal, everyone reacts differently to different sweetners.
customer_reviews.author: Carolina Fuertes Cortez

customer_reviews.title: Great protein bar
customer_reviews.text: Great Quest Bar. I was skeptical of the new sugar alcohols ,allulous, bucause the original quest bar changed their formula to include soluble corn fiber which gave me a serious bloated feeling, but these new bars are amazing. They are soft, chewy and feel and taste like you’re eating a candy bar, with no bloat or after taste.
customer_reviews.author: Jody R.

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting bars, but do not buy from Amazon in summer
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I cannot rate the shipping and Amazon seperate from the product, so I’ll say this - The Quest Hero bars are 5 stars in terms of taste, and 3+ stars in terms of nutrition. The problem is Amazon hasn’t figured out how to ship them in the summer months without them melting. Unfortunately, once they melt, they don’t really firm up correctly if you put them in the fridge. Just a crumbly mess. Buy them locally.
customer_reviews.author: Tiger paw

customer_reviews.title: A Tasty Treat
customer_reviews.text: Quest Hero Bars are a delicious low-carb snack that's satisfyingly sweet and doesn't leave you feeling like you're missing out on something without the carbs. I use these bars whenever I want a treat or a quick meal-replacement. They've got a good kick of protein without the unwanted sugar and carbs. Quest Bars are my go-to snack on the run or at home.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Unreal how tasty these are.
customer_reviews.text: Have tried a lot of protein bars. Quest Hero's are by far the best tasting ones I've ever had the pleasure of eating. I can't pick a favorite because all three flavors are my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Powell

customer_reviews.title: Probably the best Quest bar
customer_reviews.text: I tried most of the Quest bars and this was my favorite. I get them from Amazon because with all of us eating these we go through them. I appreciate that they TRY to keep these from melting by adding an ice pack but each time the ice pack has been a "heat" pack and so hot I can't touch it for long. The bars are usually melted so refrigeration is needed and then the texture suffers as they come to room temp. I really wish there was a way to get these without them being a melted mess. I probably will have to resort to finding these at a store.
customer_reviews.author: jhk

customer_reviews.title: Very sweet...but rich caramel and vanilla taste. One of the better tasting bars out there...
customer_reviews.text: Very sweet, but great taste to take the edge off when dieting. Have read several reviews that state it knocks them out of ketosis... Everyone reacts differently to ingredients... I would take some psyllium husk fiber capsules before and after eating one of these bars to reduce the net carb absorption. They taste great... And will try another flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Stewardship

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I hate regular Quest bars. The texture is so weird and they all have a chemical like taste and leave me gassy and bloated. But these Quest Hero bars are fantastic. The taste is like having a dessert and the texture is like a crunchy, gooey brownie. No complaints, other than they cost so much, so I just get them when they're on a really good sale. I wish my Walmart and Target sold the Hero bars, so I could grab a box while I'm out, but they only have regular quest, bleh!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Net carbs!?
customer_reviews.text: These bars have 19! Net carbs not 4. I guess I need to read the fine print better. Also based on another review Amazon is trying to keep the bars from melting by packing in an insulated pouch with an ice pack in it. Well the ice pack thawed and the box is soggy. The wrapper on the bars seem ok though. The bars taste ok but are very sweet. Too many carbs for even a moderately low carb diet.
customer_reviews.author: Low Dog

customer_reviews.title: Tastes surprisingly good
customer_reviews.text: Most protein bars that I've tried are designed to taste like desserts, which somewhat puts me off desserts, which isn't necessarily bad. But these are pretty good, though not quite as good as an actual candy bar. Then again, they aren't supposed to be treated like candy bars. I probably won't buy them again because I have impulse control issues regarding sweets. I'll probably stick to ones that I find to be "meh". Maybe someday I'll find a chicken alfredo flavor protein bar.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tasty but melted during delivery
customer_reviews.text: While the taste of the products themselves is good, they arrived thoroughly melted. Every other bar order I've placed on Amazon has arrived in a box and therefore had some weather/temp protection. But these arrived in a mailer envelope and become mush over the course of delivery. I had to put them in the freezer and thaw an individual bar to taste it. Again, the flavor was great, as is the variety...but the texture was ruined. The yogurty coating had melted right off of the core of the bar. If ordered in the summer, these really should be mailed in a box.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren D.

customer_reviews.title: I am impressed with how good the blueberry cobbler bar is.
customer_reviews.text: Oh my goodness. I can not believe how delicious this blueberry bar is. I am legit amazed at this basically guilt free decadent dessert. It fits perfectly into my diet. Low carb and high protein treat for anytime really without the guilt. No bad aftertaste is associated with this bar. It is pure delight to your taste buds. It isn’t to tick, the blueberry glaze under the coating is perfectly proportional to the bar. Nothing bad at all with this.
customer_reviews.author: Trista

customer_reviews.title: Check you boxes!
customer_reviews.text: I buy these frequently because they're keto. Unfortunately, this time the box was intact but several of the bars inside were opened somehow. I'm assuming it happened at the factory. I bit into one bar and almost broke my teeth before I realized the opposite end had never been sealed. I found a second opened bar this morning. I checked the remaining bars and they're sealed properly but when you buy a box of 10 and 2 have to be thrown out, it's very annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Booklover1111

customer_reviews.title: Great deal, when on sale.
customer_reviews.text: This was my first lightning deal purchase. I like paying a dollar or less per protein bar. These are very tasty. Had I known, I would have bought more for the price. There is a different kind of sweetener in these bars, but I did not experience any gastric distress or other symptoms, as sometimes can happen with the common sugar alcohol based calorie sweeteners.
customer_reviews.author: Healthnut

customer_reviews.title: Different flavor than normal
customer_reviews.text: I purchase these bars every time I go to my grocery store because I love them so much! I had to order them here on amazon because they always sell out super quickly at the store. The bars that I received from my order have a significantly different coloring and flavor of the inside cereal bar part of the bar. These bars do not taste nearly as amazing as the ones I usually get, and I am disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and better than a candy bar!
customer_reviews.text: My family and I are on a low-carb diet (lifestyle), so when I reached maintenance level I tried these bars. They're a bit higher in carbs but OMG, they are soooo delicious! I indulge sparingly, but it's a treat that I allow myself on those occasions when a funky-tasting odd-textured protein bar just won't do. I recommend these to low carbers and normies doing keto!
customer_reviews.author: WynterFire11

customer_reviews.title: My favorite portable breakfast!
customer_reviews.text: The Blueberry Cobbler is the best of all the Quest bar flavors. Don’t succumb to the romance of flavors boasting “cheesecake”, “waffles”, or “birthday cake”; the blueberry cobbler is all you’ll ever need. One of these at 8am for breakfast and I’m full until lunch! Feels like I’m still indulging but overall, this bar makes for a reasonsbly healthy breakfast or snack - especially when I consider it saves me from making bad dietary decisions.
customer_reviews.author: Jelena

customer_reviews.title: Tasty and nutritional
customer_reviews.text: This is a delicious bar for only 200 calories. It's full of nutrition--protein, fiber and calcium to name a few. Sometimes I need a chocolate kick, and now instead of reaching for say a Hershey bar, which may have the same number of calories (though it probably has more), I get a satisfying fulfillment with high nutritional value. It also is very filling, and for some unknown reason, doesn't make me crave more chocolate or sweets. It's a perfect solution for me, but it is not a meal replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Linda K. Buckley

customer_reviews.title: great tasting protein bar
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews and was skeptical about the taste but I really liked it when it arrived. I eat one after a ride. I keep it in my car and even if its hot inside it does not melt. It gets soft but does not become a big blob of a bar like other bars. Easily digested - no harsh chemical taste and the consistency is soft not crunchy or hard.
customer_reviews.author: clearthinker

customer_reviews.title: Tasty
customer_reviews.text: These are the best protein bars I have ever eaten, and I have eaten a lot. They taste really good, they have plenty of protein, not a lot of soy, they do not have loads of sugar, and they don't have ingredients that will spike your blood sugar. Those are all things I care about when it comes to protein bars and this one ticks all the boxes. I did have RNY and these work great for that!
customer_reviews.author: Kriiiis

customer_reviews.title: Taste Good, Still in Keto, Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Hasn't knocked me out of Ketosis, which is good. I typically eat these as a breakfast or post workout. Taste fantastic, but little worried about the 30 carbs even if most of them are insoluble. Just be careful if you are following a strict keto diet and they probably net a carb, carb and a half over the "4g net" claim
customer_reviews.author: NP

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product. FAR too sweet.
customer_reviews.text: Update: It sure seems like they use rancid nuts in the choc bar. These are really good. My complaint is their sweetness and the sucralose/Splenda. Who the heck eats anything remotely this sweet? Why do you even have Splenda in them when they are this freaking sweet. Just stop it already. You're reducing your sales because of this. I've slowed down my orders because I just can't handle the sickly sweetness.
customer_reviews.author: IA

customer_reviews.title: Better tasting than nearly any protein bar, with a catch
customer_reviews.text: I really like these and want to give 5 stars. However, every once in a while there is a serious chemical taste on the outside surface of the bar, I think it comes from the inside of the wrapper. It has happened a few times now and one time it was so strong I couldn't get the taste out of my mouth right away. I am a huge fan of Quest and have liked their products for years and years. I hope they fix this issue as I'm sure I'm not the only one to notice.
customer_reviews.author: Scott H.

customer_reviews.title: Better than 85% of protein bars, even slightly stale.
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered these twice - the first order was fresh. The second order was slightly stale, as if the bars had been warehoused a while. Even slightly stale, these are better than 85% of other protein bars for flavor and crisp texture. Other protien bars are so hard to bite and strange-tasting that I would rather have these, even slightly stale. They are pricey, but filling - We used these as a meal replacement on an extended driving trip - at $2.00 a meal, much better price than tourist food in pubs, and convenient while driving.
customer_reviews.author: Marianne Miller

customer_reviews.title: So yummy!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the variety pack and I really loved all 3 flavors! The vanilla caramel is my very favorite, next the blueberry then the chocolate (but chocolate isn't my favorite on a normal basis.) But all 3 really are delicious! Such a nice treat on a low carb diet! I'm planning to keep these in stock at my house. I hope they will put these on subscribe & save plan soon!
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: Great bars
customer_reviews.text: These are great bars. I arrived home today to find them sitting on my porch in 90 degree weather. I thought surely they were melted. I was more than surprised to find them wrapped in insulation and sitting on an ice pack. They were perfect! The taste is delicious and the value is excellent. I'm looking forward to ordering more.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Spencer

customer_reviews.title: So delicious!!
customer_reviews.text: So incredibly delicious. The vanilla crunch taste as good as a rice krispy treat. So good! The chocolate caramel amazing too. I agree that the only challenge is not eating more than one!! The Hero bar also did not cause any bloating for me even though it has 11 grams of fiber. A perrfect bar!
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: So GOOD!
customer_reviews.text: These bars are so tasty. It is my treat for the day. I have tried other protein bars...many are very high in calories and sugar and low in fiber, but these are perfect all around. They add a sufficient amount of protein AND fiber and taste great as well with only 1 Gm of sugar. Let's face it, some of the bars on the market are barely edible, at best.
customer_reviews.author: EGEG

customer_reviews.title: Arrived melted
customer_reviews.text: These bars are great however I was very disappointed that they arrived melted and completely misshapen. That is the only reason for the low rating. You really should consider buying these online if you want the greatness of the bar.
customer_reviews.author: angela king

customer_reviews.title: Too good, little sweeter than expected but great.
customer_reviews.text: Maybe a bit too sweet, but Quest has really done an amazing job with these new Hero bars. This flavor is amazing, but I have liked all the Hero bars so far. The new sugar substitute they use seems to not cause stomach distress, nor trigger a glycemic response.
customer_reviews.author: David Seeman

customer_reviews.title: Delicious Bar arrived MELTED
customer_reviews.text: These bars are very tasty but they arrived in freezer bag with cold pack that wasn’t cold so the bars were melted. So I put them in the fridge. 1st bar I tried I opened right out of the fridge and the white choc was stuck to wrappper so white choc all over kitchen floor. They tried but failed in shipping. They have good flavor but bars are all deformed and very unappetizing. So sad!!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen F.

customer_reviews.title: DELISH!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've been eating Quest bars for over a year now and these are absolutely the BEST!! So delicious and satisfying!! I only have to eat 1/2 of the bar and I've had my dessert!! Only problem is that they are addicting!!LOL
customer_reviews.author: virginia w. burrows

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to help with sweet cravings!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely our favorite Quest bar so far. I love that it is perfect to kick my sweet cravings and I'm still able to stick with my keto lifestyle. These bars are crunchy and yummy! Outside is "candy" coated and inside has the berry "jam" and crunchy cobbler layer. Can't believe they only have 4 net carbs!
customer_reviews.author: pippsqueak

customer_reviews.title: These are amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I love the taste of these bars. I've tried many of the quest bars and they are good. I happened to see these on Amazon and decided to try them. Probably not smart to buy 10 at a time but I cannot find them at any local store. I was not disappointed. They don't taste like any of the other quest bars. They have a different flavor and texture all together.
customer_reviews.author: Becky J Greene

customer_reviews.title: Love almost everything Quest!
customer_reviews.text: Theses bars are so good, they taste like cheating! Also, I have had issues with Amazon shipping food (getting smushed, crushed, MELTED), but these came in a foam packaged boxed with a little ice pack. Perfect! no melted bars. Would definitely recommend. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Frog

customer_reviews.title: Very sweet
customer_reviews.text: These are good but they are extremely sweet, and that’s coming from someone who has a huge sweet tooth. If they are sweet for ME, they have got to be ridiculously sweet for people that don’t usually like extra sweet things.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Harris

customer_reviews.title: If you don't eat a lot of sugar
customer_reviews.text: You will probably find these -really- sweet. Delicious though, best tasting Quest products imho. Takes care of the worst cravings, but I'll stick to the regular bars for every day. Rare thumbs down to Amazon for taking a week to ship, and now it's hot out and they're going to arrive deformed. .
customer_reviews.author: Joe Doaks

customer_reviews.title: Quest Hero Laxative?
customer_reviews.text: This bar taste very good, so I give it 3 stars for that. However, I am only giving it a 3 stars and not 5 because it has a laxative affect on my stomach. This bar is like eating those Stovers sugar free chocolates and will make you run to the bathroom. I don't have stomach troubles with Erythritol or Sucralose, so it must be the Allulose they use. I don't have stomach trouble with Quest regular bars. So this was disappointing to me.
customer_reviews.author: JSBauter

customer_reviews.title: Not as I remember
customer_reviews.text: I use to really like these but took a break for a few months so that I wouldn't get bored of them. Now I try them again and they feel super light and airy. It's basically tastes like a chocolate rice crispy treat. I'd rather just buy rice crispy treats.
customer_reviews.author: Noel

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Protein Bars
customer_reviews.text: Wow, these are great! Awesome nutritional profile and great taste. Using these to help with my diet and to get added protein without all the net carbs. And really like how they were packed and shipped with care and on ice so they wouldn’t melt in this summer heat.
customer_reviews.author: C. Alaimo

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good for a low-carb sweet snack
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for an intense blueberry flavor, but only the thin chewy blueberry layer tastes like blueberry (including the seeds). The rest is more like a sweet protein nougat. Larger ("hero" size) than other Quest protein bars. Low in carbs.
customer_reviews.author: David Spector

customer_reviews.title: Fixed shipping issue.
customer_reviews.text: These were delicious! When I first got them I thought what a waste of packaging and then realized in today's heat they never melted. I was able to recycle the insulated packaging for the bottom of a gift basket for a present. I was very pleased that the heat was considered and packed appropriately. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Jaz L.

customer_reviews.title: WARNING! NOT 4g net carbs!
customer_reviews.text: Should have searched the internet for the nutrition facts. Super disappointed. it's 15g net carbs, not 4. NO idea how they come to this number. I've purchased other products from quest and been super happy. This sucks,
customer_reviews.author: Ricey

customer_reviews.title: My favorite protein bar
customer_reviews.text: If you're on keto like me, this will taste like a candy bar. So good.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy K.

customer_reviews.title: F’ing delicious
customer_reviews.text: I’m sorry but these are f—-ing delicious. They’re big too, so not like typical bars where you feel like you need to eat more than one to be full. How are these so good?! What sort of evil magic is involved here??! I’ll be buying a box of these for the rest of my life probably.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Good.
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite bars. The Vanilla flavor is very good. If you're a chocolate lover, please don't give these a bad review just because you want chocolate. I find most chocolate snacks are way to rich so I don't like them for me. If you like vanilla, you will probably like these for taste. The texture is great. It feels like your eating real food, unlike most of the other Quest bars.
customer_reviews.author: KRS

customer_reviews.title: Delicious but not worth the calories
customer_reviews.text: The Caramel Pecan is my favorite! ♡ I absolutely LOVE this bar!!! I would give it 5 stars but I didn't due to the calories being so high with a smaller amount of protein than other Quest Bars. Also, they don't satisfy hunger but they do help with my sweet tooth. It's a good bar to have when you need variety but I would rather stick to the original Quest bars.
customer_reviews.author: O SWFL

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Bad timing for hot temps.
customer_reviews.text: Overall I’m very happy with Quest products. However,it may not have been the best time to order these as it was like the hottest day of the year. When I received them the box was hot and the ice pack in the box was hot enough for a nice warm compress, which I knew at that moment they were literally all melted. So, I just tossed them in the freezer. Sure enough when I opened one you could see part of the chocolate stuck in spots between where the wrapper was when I placed them in the freezer. Not the sellers fault and not shipping. You can’t control weather. Especially in Michigan.
customer_reviews.author: Fee33

customer_reviews.title: Why I am giving this a lower rating.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the bar but when it came to us it had been melted. I can still eat the bar but the covering was melted. The packaging is also melted to the bar but not all the bar is melted on the paper. I think because it has chocolate on it that it needs to be refrigerated. Sorry. I would have give 5 stars but because of the problem I am giving it less.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Robinson

customer_reviews.title: best protein bar on the market
customer_reviews.text: This is by far my all time favorite protein bar - great taste - low net carbs - only 1g sugar - say WHAT???? I am soo pleased with this product and many others by quest - if you've never tried it - now is the time and no I am not being paid by them lol - I just stand by what I know to be worth it - it also satisfies a sweet tooth without the sugar.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor!
customer_reviews.text: We are huge fans of quest bars however this is our favorite flavor. This flavor taste similar to a blueberry muffin and has a great consistency. The high-protein keeps me full for longer periods of time without high amount of calories
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: My go to low carb high protein snack
customer_reviews.text: I eat 1/2 bar almost daily. Its a great way to curb my sweet tooth, get some extra protein in & stay under my carb count for the day. As a bariatric patient, my diet is pretty strict & this almost feels like cheating!
customer_reviews.author: Brooklyn Jones

customer_reviews.title: Flavor was awesome. The only reason this product didn’t get five ...
customer_reviews.text: Flavor was awesome. The only reason this product didn’t get five stars from me isn’t anything to do with nutritional value or the products not showing up on time. I want to clarify that it did show up on time but the product is hard not to get on your shirt or pants. It has a tendency to Crumble easily. Make sure you’re not wearing your Sunday best when eating Lol...
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely delicious and filling keto bar!
customer_reviews.text: There’s nothing I dislike about this keto bar and everything that I do like! It tastes good, it’s filling, and if anybody tried to take it away I’d have to fight them for it! They also arrived in a box, to protect them!
customer_reviews.author: Poodle

customer_reviews.title: Melted during shipment
customer_reviews.text: Despite being packaged in a foil pouch with a reusable 'ice pouch' (which had thawed at some point), the product arrived with the chocolate coating on the bar melted and gooey. After putting in the fridge for a while, I tried one. The taste was okay but the texture wasn't good. Perhaps because of the melt/resolidify situation.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best from quest so far!
customer_reviews.text: Taste great. Not the highest in protein for a big guy on a high protein diet but a great supplement none the less. Very high fiber, no soy isolate, and very little sugar, plus a very good texture compared to other quest bars makes this a superior protein bar.
customer_reviews.author: Chase L.

customer_reviews.title: Insulate the Box!
customer_reviews.text: I love these bars. They are the best of the few bars out there without nuts. This order was disappointing. The quality of these was not good because they were melted. Once cooled, they were misshaped the coating stuck to the wrapper.
customer_reviews.author: Deb Z

customer_reviews.title: Bar melted in the heat
customer_reviews.text: My box Came in the regular mail, with,the heat they were all melted, might be best to ship with a cold mack when it hot. Otherwise we like these bars and will try and find a local vendor
customer_reviews.author: gloria nargis

customer_reviews.title: Best protein bar ever
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite keto snack. I only eat a bite or two at a time and wrap the rest for a later date. They taste like I’m cheating. Even better when you warm them up in the microwave for just a couple seconds. They become soft and gooey.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda H

customer_reviews.title: Big fan of the other Quest Hero bars, but these are my least favorite
customer_reviews.text: I'm a big fan of the blueberry cobbler Quest Hero flavor, and the chocolate caramel are pretty dang solid, but these just didn't do it for me. I was wondering why you don't see vanilla and caramel in candy more often, but now I know why, it's just not a great combo. Still decent macros for the taste, and better than most other protein bars, but ehhh.
customer_reviews.author: Ben S.

customer_reviews.title: Great price- delicious and sweet
customer_reviews.text: This- at the time- had a great price! Lower in carbs and sugars, this flavor is a true sweet treat. Absolutely delicious! Note- this flavor of Quest bars is super sweet- if you like it less sweet- I would try a different flavor. It has a very good coating, plus a chewy/sticky inside, so it is definitely sweeter than their other bars- but I still love them.
customer_reviews.author: JML Enterprises

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!!
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME!!! Quest out did themselves with the Hero bars.. I didn't think it could get much better then there regular Quest bars but they did it!!! But I still love the Chocolate chip cookie dough bars
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl

customer_reviews.title: The Best Quest Bars
customer_reviews.text: I have tried a few different Quest bars and this is by far my favorite. It is the only one I've tried (out of 4 or 5 flavors) that has a mixture of textures and sweetness. I'm on the Keto diet but still have MAJOR sweet tooth at night. Other bars (Atkins) have too much sugar alcohol in them and stalls me, this doesn't do that. I cut my bars in half and only eat half at a time. If they were a little cheaper I would by more than a box at a time but then I'd probably eat them a lot quicker, too!
customer_reviews.author: M. Henneman

customer_reviews.title: How do they taste so good?
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I love Quest Bars. They’re perfect in a pinch when we’re hungry but we don’t have a lot of time (usually around breakfast), as a post work out meal/snack, or as a road trip snack that’s way better for us that fast food. Also, definitely worth mentioning, they are SO delicious - sometimes I can’t believe they’re healthy. Thank you for making such yummy yet healthy food :)
customer_reviews.author: amber318

customer_reviews.title: Best tasting quest bar.
customer_reviews.text: Not only does this particular flavor taste great, it is very high in fiber and one of the lower calorie versions of the quest bar. It's a tad expensive, but it's a great product!
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: If you wanted a candy bar
customer_reviews.text: Great tasting but has an insane amoumt of sugar for a true “protein bar”. Should not have been in health department. Basically a glorified candy bar. But the non “Hero” versions are amazing and great for weight management or gym goers
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived melted.
customer_reviews.text: I really like these bars, and was really excited to be able to get them here. Unfortunately, while the bars are great, the delivery leaves a lot to be desired. The first time I ordered them, they were melted inside the wrapper and were an absolute mess to try to eat. I thought I'd give them another shot. They were fine the second time. Just got the third box and they are melted again. 1 or of 3 is not a great score. Really hope they figure something out soon or I guess I'll only try for them in the middle of winter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Purchase from Amazon
customer_reviews.text: I never write reviews, but for this I need too. I’ve previously purchased these from my gym and they were delicious. Chewy, soft, amazing. The ones I just had delivered from Amazon are rock hard, to the point that they’re barely edible. I had to put it in the microwave to soften it up just so I could eat it. They’re extremely stale. I checked the expiration date and they’re due to expire next month. Please save yourself the money and purchase them directly from the store, not Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as most Quest bars
customer_reviews.text: I love quest bars. But this flavor does not taste as good as most Quest Bars. Also it is not as filling. It is okay for a change but I will not be ordering this Quest Bar flavor again.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: There are by far and away the best tasting quest bars. Do yourself a favor and try these even if you disliked previous quest bars. The hero line tastes much different than the others and these are the best of the hero bars.
customer_reviews.author: Galen Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Like fireworks in my mouth
customer_reviews.text: Holy crap. Not a huge fan of original Quest bars, they do okay in a pinch, but holy crap. These are amazing. They taste like candy. If one of these doesn't knock me out of ketosis it'll be a miracle because they taste too good to be true.
customer_reviews.author: Lucie Journet

customer_reviews.title: Delicious! My favorite flavor of the Hero bars
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love all the Quest Hero bars, but this one is my favorite. It is very filling and a good bar to use for breakfast. Some reviews said they had issues with the bars being out of date but I did not have any problems out of the 6 boxes that I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: almost_an_engineer

customer_reviews.title: Best Keto Protein Bars On the Market
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite quest bars they taste like a normal chocolate bar! Reminds me of a watchamaclic. I love everything about these!! My favorite obsession right now and I can have these on my keto diet!! Yes!!
customer_reviews.author: Ketomomof6boys

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor and texture, no fake sugar taste.
customer_reviews.text: These are delicious. I use them as my "candy bar" treat when I want to indulge since I ditched sugar. So good, no weird fake taste either. Pretty big too. Great texture.
customer_reviews.author: Roni W

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these because I wanted something high in protein for after the gym. They were just delivered and looked so good I just had to try one right away. I am not disappointed. They are delicious!! I was also surprised by how big the bar is. I was expecting it to be much smaller. I will definitely be ordering these again along with some other flavors.
customer_reviews.author: t.baumann

customer_reviews.title: yummy!! no after taste
customer_reviews.text: excellent for when you need that something sweet or if your on the go. none of that fake sweet aftertaste. not all flavors are as good as the blueberry cobbler.
customer_reviews.author: carrieear

customer_reviews.title: One of the better protein bars I’ve had
customer_reviews.text: One of the better protein bars I’ve had. Usually they taste like cardboard/dirt, these are pretty pleasant to eat and have a good chunk of protein. Now my stock snack. Prefer the vanilla ones but these make a nice change.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Delicious - Great For Those Sweets Cravings (When Trying To Avoid)
customer_reviews.text: I try and stay in ketosis as long as possible, but I have an awful sweet tooth. These help provide that relief without being too carb'd out. For someone that really loves sweets and does their best to stay away, these really hit the spot.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Worst Packaging by Quest
customer_reviews.text: Quest Bars tasted good but the box came in a cold pack box that was leaking water on the floor. Food item packaging was not needed to keep bars cold. Waste of lined packing with sealed bag of liquid. Not good for recycling!
customer_reviews.author: P. Mescus

customer_reviews.title: One of the best
customer_reviews.text: Quest Hero bars are the cream of the crop. These are delicious. One of my favorites. Minimal fake/protein flavor, lots of crunch and real blueberry taste. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Mo

product_meta.title: Quest Nutrition Chocolate Caramel Pecan Hero Protein bar, Low Carb, Gluten Free, 10 Count
feature_bullets: YOU DESERVE A SWEET TREAT: The Quest Crispy Chocolate Caramel Pecan Hero Protein Bar tastes like a sweet, indulgent dessert. Only our bar has 16g protein, 4g net carbs and 1g of sugar
UNWRAP COMPLETE PROTEINS: The Quest Crispy Chocolate Caramel Pecan Hero Protein Bar are made with complete, dairy-based proteins to provide your body with 9 essential amino acids
FIBER IS YOUR FRIEND: The Quest Crispy Chocolate Caramel Pecan Hero Protein Bars have 11g of fiber to provide your body with a more complete macro profile
SWEET WITHOUT ALL THE SUGAR: Enjoy the sweet taste of Chocolate and caramel with pecans without worrying about excess sugar. The Quest Crispy Chocolate Caramel Pecan Hero Protein Bar has 1g of sugar
TREATS THAT TRAVEL WITH YOU: Take Quest Crispy Chocolate Caramel Pecan Hero Protein Bars with you in your backpack, purse, car console, cup holder, gym bag or wherever your adventures take you
Box contains 10 Crispy Chocolate Caramel Pecan flavored Quest Hero Protein Bars
